DOC.detailed_description: High blood pressure one common health problem country . It cause many factor , include stress , diet , diabetes , kidney disease , obesity . In many people , identifiable cause high blood pressure . If high blood pressure go untreated , lead heart failure , kidney failure , stroke . Previous study show variation three gene chromosome 1—ATP1B1 , RGS5 , SELE—cause people susceptible develop high blood pressure . All three gene involve development protein play role regulate blood pressure , know exactly variation gene affect blood pressure level . This study examine previously collect genetic sample participant two clinical trial , GenNet study Heredity Phenotype Interaction ( HAPI ) Heart study . Study researcher analyze sample identify characterize variation ATP1B1 , RGS5 , SELE gene . Results study may lead effective diagnostic treatment option people high blood pressure .
